metadata.title: Flash Furniture Charla Crown Back Black Metal Barstool with Black Vinyl Swivel Seat
features: Provide the perfect on-trend appeal in your home with this bar height stool featuring floor protector glides to defend your flooring. This stool is perfect for the kitchen, paired with a pub table for card night or extra seating for guests.
Crown back design, vinyl upholstery, swivel seat
CAL 117 fire retardant foam, glossy black powder coated frame finish, footrest
Contemporary style fits nicely in your kitchen, dining room or living space
PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS: Overall Size: 21"W x 17"D x 38.5"H; Seat Size: 16"W x 16"D x 30"H; Back Size: 21"W x 9"H
description: Clean lines and elegant simplicity are the hallmarks of this crown back black metal barstool featuring a black vinyl upholstered swivel seat. This sophisticated yet comfortable metal stool is perfect for casual everyday use as well as small gatherings in the kitchen, dining room or bar area and will add an inviting atmosphere to your space. Meanwhile, floor protector glides ensure that your flooring is free from scratching and other damage while making it easy to slide and transport the chair. A full 360 degree swivel, crown back and footrest ring provides comfort and ease.
